attributes.action: give priority help to those who pay their way in this country and end the injustice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that the Prime Minister addresses the current crises (as that is what we are all in) and to end the joke whereby drug addicts, alcoholics and people who choose not to work or earn their way in life, take priority housing from the people who do earn their way in life.

And stop the handouts for people who don't even attempt to sign on... And reward those who do work with help when they need it.
